```{r}
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
con <- dbConnect(SQLite(), dbname = "england.db")
tables <- dbListTables(con)
tables

result <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM matches")
result
```

```{r}


matchesTable <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM matches")%>%
  collect()
matchesTable
```
